Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Shopper "Amazon shopper"
Reviews.Content: It works as advertised and my daughter gets so many compliments. I gave it 5 stars because I had a question and the customer service was great! I would purchase this item again.

ProductInfo.Features:
Cute, lightweight, and compact Hello Kitty Mobile charger
New 3D Power On the Go.  No More charging on the conventional wall outlet
Great and beautiful design for Hello Kitty lovers (Charge your phone with style)
Comes with cables for All Iphone 4, 5 and Samsung (For other phone models, you can use your own charging cable, and plug it to the Hello Kitty Battery and charge your phone)
Uses Lithium Polymer batteries (Safe and Eco friendly)
ProductInfo.Name: 3D Hello Kitty Iphone Samsung Chargers 5S 4S S3 Ipad tablet (Portable External Universal Chargers) 8000MAH (Red)
